short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: probability based user link diverting to Youtube video

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension provides a 2% chance of re-direction to Carlos Matos on Youtube when navigating to a new page. The extension generates a random number, which, if within the threshold will intercept the request and set the re-direct URL.

The 2% chance can be customised in the options page to any value between 1% and 100%.

Re-direction link:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ne-J4pAKAT4
